title: Tootsie Roll logo - Cooper Black, ??? {Dan, ???}
content:
Hey guys,  
I can't seem to find the font for the Tootsie Roll Pop's logo. I need two IDs one for the Tootsie Roll and one for the Pops. Ya'lls help will be greatly appreciated!!

link to the logo: [http://www.tootsie.com/img/popsLogo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20141027182015/http:/www.tootsie.com/img/popsLogo.gif "http://www.tootsie.com/img/popsLogo.gif")
author: swtboyazn

comments.content: "Tootsie Roll" looks like it is set in [Cooper Black](http://web.archive.org/).
